content: Monitors and evaluates network performance, reliability and scalability, troubleshoots and resolves network and security problems
Analyzes network requirements, resolve conflicts between users, recommends favorable networking approaches, and expands network systems design
Designs, implements and supports multiple types of data networks
Defines alternative scenarios for network applications; explains network inter-connectivity
Designs optimal routes between any two points on a network
Configure Ethernet switch ports and Implement VLANs.
Implement static routing, DHCP, NAT and ACLs
Configure and troubleshoot routers and switches
Resolve common issues with OSPF, EIGRP, and STP in both IPv4 and IPv6 networks
Install, configure and manage Microsoft Hyper-V, monitor, and maintain virtual machine installations
Design Tools (Adobe Photoshop CC and Adobe Illustrator CC)
Principles of Design
HTML & CSS
JavaScript
UI/UX

content: Creating fully functional website
Preparing design plan, presenting site structure and how different parts link together
Deciding which branding, text, colors and backgrounds to use
Laying out pages and positioning buttons, links and pictures using design software
Adding multimedia features like sound, animation and video
Factoring in security and download speed of the design pages
Meeting clients to discuss what they want their site to do and who will use it
Generic IT Skills
Manual Testing
Automated Testing
ISTQB

content: Working on data visualization using latest modern web technologies such as: Tableau, Power BI, Kibana…
Developing prediction models using popular development frameworks such as TensorFlow, Pytorch…
EDA-focused technologies with the corresponding tools and environment
Develop modern and reliable Data Pipelines
Working with latest version of PyCharm, Spyder & Jupyter Notebook/Lab
Working as a Data Scientist/Machine Learning Practitioner covering Data ingestion, Data wrangling/munging, Data visualization & representation, Data Modeling
Working with relational and non-relational Database Management Systems (RDBMS, ElasticSearch, Hadoop)
Developing Cloud-ready, scalable and performant models
AI ethics
Introduction and Frameworks
Digital Advertising
Search Engine Optimization
Websites & Landing Pages
Data Gathering, Analysis and Reporting
Digital Marketing Strategy
Grapics Design Basics

content: Demonstrate a clear understanding of the core concepts of digital marketing
Plan and create paid social media campaigns on platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn
Master the key social platforms and understand the relevance and application of each individual social platform from a digital marketing perspective
Understand the fundamental concepts of PPC advertising
Conduct effective keyword research
Demonstrate proficiency in building and optimizing Google Search and Google Display campaigns
Run effective marketing campaigns on YouTube and Google Video advertising solutions
